Data.title: ActionAuthorized event data
Data.description: The data within all ActionAuthorizedEvent events

Resource.title: ActionAuthorized resource definition
Resource.description: Provides detailed information about the token issuance

id.description: The identifier of the principal to whom the token was issued

Auth.title: Auth context
Auth.description: Authentication context for the token issuance

id.description: The unique identifier of the authenticated principal.

Action.title: Action
Action.description: Details about the action that was authorized.

actionId.description: The service-specific identifier of the action that was authorized.

targetResourceErn.description: The ERN of the resource that was the target of the authorization check; will be omitted for coarse-grained actions.

targetServiceId.description: For service-aspect actions, indicates the service that was the target of the authorized action.

accessPolicyErn.description: For access-policy scoped requests, indicates the ERN of the access policy that was used as the basis of the authorization check. Not provided for role-assignment scoped requests.

attributeValues.description: Indicates the action-level attribute values that were part of the authorization context.

resourceAttributeValues.description: Indicates the resource-level attribute values that were part of the authorization context.

resourceTags.description: Indicates the resource tags that were part of the authorization context.
